physical_appearance:This is an embroidered tunic. It has mid-length sleeves. It is multicolored
 with various coloured panellings and embroidered designs. It has a small square collar.

sgcool_label_text:This is a tunic or chola
 worn traditionally in the Sindh region of Pakistan. The tunic would have been made for a woman
 to be worn for special occasions.
